tag_list: web-design, ui-development, front-end-development, html, css, javascript, jquery, ajax, web-development, php, mysql, oop, database-design--development, online-marketing, ppc, sem, seo, smo, lamp
overview:
Ziad Naseriddin has been involved professionally in the web industry since early 2006. He is an experienced web specialist on his journey to become a master in the craft. With his glowing passion for web and technology, he considers himself as highly privileged to be able to work for fun.

Ziad is driven by his passion for an urge to create things. He is also a team player who knows that it takes a team to develop great projects. He enjoys collaborating with colleagues and clients, and will voluntarily help and teach whenever needed. He has very good analytical skills, high ability to find realistic e-solutions such as re-engineering web components to be more user-friendly and customized, design and implement applications for a very high traffic and large-scale websites.

Ziad is experienced in PHP, MySQL, Apache, HTML, CSS, AJAX and jQurey, he is also a fast learner who loves to read and learn more about technology, especially when its related to his field (web in general), and he believes that the better developer is the one who can develop his own skills faster with a better QUALITY.
